SELECT org.ORG_NAME, org.ORG_CODE, ( SELECT p.ORG_NAME FROM mp_organization p WHERE p.id = org.PARENT_ID ) parent_name, ( SELECT p.ORG_CODE FROM mp_organization p WHERE p.id = org.PARENT_ID ) parent_code, ( SELECT s.label FROM sys_dict_item s WHERE s.id = org.org_level ) org_level, ( SELECT s.label FROM sys_dict_item s WHERE s.id = org.org_type ) org_type, org.org_desc, CASE WHEN org.ORGANIZATIONAL = 0 THEN '否' when org.ORGANIZATIONAL = 1 THEN '是' END center_status , ( SELECT u.USER_NAME FROM mp_user u WHERE u.ID=org.org_charge_work_no ) charge_user_name, ( SELECT p.POST_NAME FROM mp_post p WHERE p.ID=org.charge_org ) charge_post_name, CASE WHEN org.IS_VIRTUAL = 0 THEN '否' when org.IS_VIRTUAL = 1 THEN '是' END virtual_status , org.CREATED_TIME FROM mp_organization org WHERE 1=1
AND org.ORG_CODE LIKE concat(#{orgCode},'%')
ORDER BY org.ORG_CODE ASC LIMIT 0, 10
